sentences: Todd "Dammit" Kerns is a Canadian musician who has worked with several Canadian bands, most notably The Age of Electric.
section: N/A

sentences: Kerns is currently the bass guitarist and back up vocalist for Slash in the band Slash featuring Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators.
